regexCodeList.string: You start paying increased attention to your surroundings\.$
You stop paying increased attention to your surroundings\.$
You sit down and rest your tired bones\.$
You are subjected to the following effects:
You weave flows of Spirit around yourself, and you feel protected.
You are subjected to the following effects:
You are subjected to the following effects:

Trigger.name: Sneak
Trigger.script: if matches[5] == "S" then status_bar.char.sneak = true status_bar.sneak:echo("SNEAK", "green", "c") else status_bar.char.sneak = false status_bar.sneak:echo("sneak", "red", "c") end

Trigger.name: Standard
Trigger.script:
status_bar.char.hps.current = tonumber(matches[2]) status_bar.char.hps.max = tonumber(matches[3]) status_bar.char.mvs.current = tonumber(matches[4]) status_bar.char.mvs.max = tonumber(matches[5])
local msg_hp = f"HP: {status_bar.char.hps.current}({status_bar.char.hps.max})" status_bar.hps:echo(msg_hp, "white", "c")
local msg_mvs = f"MV: {status_bar.char.mvs.current}({status_bar.char.mvs.max})" status_bar.mvs:echo(msg_mvs, "white", "c")

regexCodeList.string: You have (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) hit and (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) movement points\.$

Trigger.name: Channeler
Trigger.script:
status_bar.char.hps.current = tonumber(matches[2]) status_bar.char.hps.max = tonumber(matches[3]) status_bar.char.sps.current = tonumber(matches[4]) status_bar.char.sps.max = tonumber(matches[5]) status_bar.char.mvs.current=tonumber(matches[6]) status_bar.char.mvs.max = tonumber(matches[7])
local msg_hp = f"HP: {status_bar.char.hps.current}({status_bar.char.hps.max})" status_bar.hps:echo(msg_hp, "white", "c")
local msg_sp = f"SP: {status_bar.char.sps.current}({status_bar.char.sps.max})" status_bar.sps_dps:echo(msg_sp, "white", "c")
local msg_mv = f"MV: {status_bar.char.mvs.current}({status_bar.char.mvs.max})" status_bar.mvs:echo(msg_mv, "white", "c")

regexCodeList.string: You have (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) hit, (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) saidar and (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) movement points\.$
You have (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) hit, (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) saidin and (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) movement points\.$

Trigger.name: Fade
Trigger.script:
status_bar.char.hps.current = tonumber(matches[2]) status_bar.char.hps.max = tonumber(matches[3]) status_bar.char.dps.current = tonumber(matches[4]) status_bar.char.dps.max = tonumber(matches[5]) status_bar.char.mvs.current=tonumber(matches[6]) status_bar.char.mvs.max = tonumber(matches[7])
local msg_hp = f"HP: {status_bar.char.hps.current}({status_bar.char.hps.max})" status_bar.hps:echo(msg_hp, "white", "c")
local msg_dp = f"DP: {status_bar.char.dps.current}({status_bar.char.dps.max})" status_bar.sps_dps:echo(msg_dp, "white", "c")
local msg_mv = f"MV: {status_bar.char.mvs.current}({status_bar.char.mvs.max})" status_bar.mvs:echo(msg_mv, "white", "c")

regexCodeList.string: You have (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) hit, (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) dark power and (-?\d+)\((\d+)\) movement points\.$

Trigger.name: Wimpy reset to:
Trigger.script: status_bar.char.autoflee = tonumber(matches[2]) local msg = f"Autoflee: {status_bar.char.autoflee}" status_bar.autoflee:echo(msg, "white", "c")

regexCodeList.string: You will now flee if you go below (\d+) hit points\.$
You will flee below: (\d+) Hit Points$
You won't flee from any fight now.

Trigger.name: Bleeding
Trigger.script:
status_bar.char.hps.max = status_bar.char.hps.max or 1
if status_bar.char.hps.current then if status_bar.char.hps.current > math.floor(0.2 * status_bar.char.hps.max) then status_bar.char.hps.est_max = math.floor(0.2 * status_bar.char.hps.max) status_bar.char.hps.current = nil end else if status_bar.char.hps.est_min and status_bar.char.hps.est_min > math.floor(0.2 * status_bar.char.hps.max) then status_bar.char.hps.est_min = nil end if status_bar.char.hps.est_max then status_bar.char.hps.est_max = math.min(status_bar.char.hps.est_max, math.floor(0.2 * status_bar.char.hps.max)) end end
if not status_bar.char.hps.current and status_bar.char.hps.est_min == status_bar.char.hps.est_max then status_bar.char.hps.current = status_bar.char.hps.est_min status_bar.char.hps.est_min = nil status_bar.char.hps.est_max = nil end
local msg = "Hit Points" if status_bar.char.hps.current then msg = f"HP: {status_bar.char.hps.current}({status_bar.char.hps.max})" else msg = "HP: "..(status_bar.char.hps.est_min or "???").."-"..(status_bar.char.hps.est_max or "???")..f"({status_bar.char.hps.max})" end status_bar.hps:echo(msg, "white", "c")

regexCodeList.string: You wish that your wounds would stop BLEEDING so much!

Trigger.name: You are dead
Trigger.script:
status_bar.char.hps.current = 1
local msg_hps = f"HP: {status_bar.char.hps.current}({status_bar.char.hps.max})" status_bar.hps:echo(msg_hps, "white", "c")
status_bar.char.fleelag = {min = 0, max = 0} local msg_fleelag = "Fleelag: 0" status_bar.fleelag:echo(msg_fleelag, "white", "c")
status_bar.char.charge_pulses = {min = 7, max = 7} local msg_charge_pulses = "Charge pulses: 7" status_bar.charge_pulses:echo(msg_charge_pulses, "white", "c")

Trigger.name: Stats
Trigger.script:
status_bar.char.int = tonumber(matches[3]) status_bar.char.wil = tonumber(matches[4]) status_bar.char.con=tonumber(matches[6])
if status_bar.char.level then status_bar.char.sps.max = status_bar.char.sps.max or 7 * status_bar.char.wil + math.min(status_bar.char.level, 30) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your base abilities are: Str:(\d+) Int:(\d+) Wil:(\d+) Dex:(\d+) Con:(\d+)\.$

Trigger.name: Level
Trigger.script:
status_bar.char.level = tonumber(matches[3])
if status_bar.char.wil then status_bar.char.sps.max = status_bar.char.sps.max or 7 * status_bar.char.wil + math.min(status_bar.char.level, 30) end

Trigger.name: Personal Health and Movement Points
Trigger.script:
local hps = matches[13] local sps = matches[15] local dps = matches[17] local mvs = matches[19]
if hps ~= "" then status_bar:update_hps_with_range(hps) end if sps ~= "" then status_bar:update_sps_with_range(sps) end if dps ~= "" then status_bar:update_dps_with_range(dps) end if mvs ~= "" then status_bar:update_mvs_with_range(mvs) end

regexCodeList.string: You feel the flows of saidin coursing through your body.
You feel the flows of saidar coursing through your body.

Trigger.name: You are already in touch with

regexCodeList.string: You are already in touch with
You are already in touch with saidin, can't you feel it?
You are already in touch with saidar, can't you feel it?
You aren't in touch with saidin to release anything.
You aren't in touch with saidar to release anything.
You feel an icy chill as if you plunged into a cold river.
You feel no connection to the True Source to release.
You can't alter a weave when you aren't in touch with the Source.
You fight a wave of sickness, and saidin slips from your grasp.

regexCodeList.string: You catch a smell of horses nearby.

TriggerGroup.name: Edit tabs displayed based on character

Trigger.name: Non fade
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == "trolloc" then status_bar.tab_settings["smells"].display = true else status_bar.tab_settings["smells"].display = false end
if matches[4] == "channeler" then status_bar.tab_settings["sps_dps"].display = true status_bar.tab_settings["one_power"].display = true else status_bar.tab_settings["sps_dps"].display = false status_bar.tab_settings["one_power"].display = false end
status_bar:show_status_bar(true)

regexCodeList.string: ^You are a \d+ year old (\w+) (\w+) (\w+)\. It's your birthday today!$
^You are a \d+ year old (\w+) myrddraal\. It's your birthday today!$
